featured.text: Meanwhile, fans across the U.S. are flocking to sports shows to have their heroes sign anything from a bat to a box of cereal.

definition.zh_def: 蝙蝠，一種夜行性飛行哺乳動物，通常以昆蟲為食。
definition.en_def: A bat is a nocturnal flying mammal that typically feeds on insects.
definition.example: The bat flew out of the cave at dusk.
